name: POLYBIUS (itch) (JWG.LLC)
description:
WARNING:  Constant bright rapid flashing lights. (May also cause motion sickness.)

 Polybius of legend:

Do not tell others about it. Do not share tips. Do not talk about it. It doesn't exist. You can't beat it. Do not play it for too long. Remember to eat, bath, sleep and don't play it too much. If you can't stop yourself from playing it Do NOT contact the devs about it, they can't help you. The devs don't exist.

JWG.LLC Rated: E/18+* (Please get a Parents permission:  Serious Seizure warning*  EVERYTHING rapidly flashes independently of one another, With a spinning flashing background that changes and speeds up as you play)
